artist: Monogrammist HB with the Griffin's Head
title: Venus and Cupid
provenance:
Allegedly from England. [1] Dr. Ehrenfest, Vienna, Austria. Hans Purrman, Berlin, Germany by 1925. Walter Ochsenbein, Zurich, Schweiz by 1956; [2] (Richard F. Zinser, Forest Hills, New York); sold to MIA in 1956.

[1] 1921 in Berliner Handel. See von der Osten no. 135.

[2] letter from Walter Ochsenbein in object file regarding payment for painting mentioning Zinser.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
